pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, and shoes plus socks.

Active_Ingredients.name: Glyphosate, N-(phosphonomethyl) glycine, isopropylamine salt
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Inhibits an enzyme essential to formation of specific amino acids

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Do not get in eyes, on skin, or on clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling. Remove contaminated clothing and wash clothing before re-use.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label when calling a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
